about_the_game:
"What? I've been chosen as humanity's representative, and now I have to prove how promising our species is? But how am I supposed to do that? My plan for entering adult life didn't include anything like this! And what do girls have to do with it? Oh, that's what 'promising' means. Hmm... Hehe... Maybe it's not so bad after all?"

"An Alien Girls Fell on My Head" is an erotic visual novel with dating simulator elements. Develop relationships, uncover secrets, and try to forget about the importance of your success. The fate of humanity is far from being the most important thing in life!

Features:
• 6 Romantic Stories: Meet and participate in the girls' lives. Help solve their problems while taking care of yourself, and learn what's happening around you. At least a little bit...

• Animated Illustrations: Erotic scenes are fully drawn and animated, with first-person view that leaves even the most sophisticated viewer impressed.

• Aliens and Romance: Isn't this a perfect combination for fun and awkward situations?

• Character Cameos from the EmyLiveShow Game Series: Meet familiar heroes in new surroundings and circumstances.

content_descriptors.notes: All characters in the game are adults. Characters, plot, and actions are fictional. The game contains adult content, including: sexual scenes, use of sex toys, sex, masturbation, discussions about sex, partial and full nudity.

name: An alien girl fell on my head, and now I must save our world by demonstrating great and beautiful love

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Win 7 or higher 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3 Gen or higher
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Storage: 3 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4 Gen or higher
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce gtx 550 (min 2 Gb)
  • Storage: 3 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated

dejus.descriptors:
Sexo Explícito
Drogas lícitas
Linguagem imprópria

short_description: Dive into a world where aliens, studying, and sex intertwine in the most unexpected combination! Take part in a romantic and erotic experiment that will determine the fate of humanity, under the watchful eye of a very strict judge.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Greek, Danish, Indonesian, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Thai, Turkish, Swedish, Japanese, Hebrew
